name: 2D Shooter Platformer
description:
2D Shooter Platformer

Game ini merupakan game buatan saya yang pertama untuk projek skripsi saya, di game ini saya tidak membuat payment sama sekali karena saya menggunakan free assets dari unity store dan itch.io

[English Translate]

This game is the very first game I created and I created it for my final project in college, for anyone who finds this game and wondering what language this game is, it's Indonesia language, I haven't made the English version of it.

I make no payment out of it because I use all free assets from unity store and itch.io

For my fellow Indonesians. 

tolong isi kuisioner dibawah  yah untuk keperluan skripsi, terima kasih.
